attributes.action: President Donald Trump and his government to be banned from entering the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
It has been widely reported that President Donald Trump is banning entry to the United States for citizens of 7 countries for an initial 90 day period.

http://edition.cnn.com/2017/01/27/politics/donald-trump-refugees-executive-order/index.html

It has also been suggested that this is just the start and the scope of the ban will extended.

A previous petition to ban Trump attacted 570000 signatures but was not unheld. 

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-35321834

Now its time to try again.
attributes.background: President Trump has signed an executive order banning citizens from 7 Muslim majority countries entering the United States. In protest at this racist discrimination and as a symbol of solidarity with the Muslim world the petitioners are calling for President Trump to be banned from entering the UK.
